channel.title: 317 HELP MEH ------- Adding working ancients?
channel.description: [size=25pt]I NEED WORKING ANCIENTS[/size]Will give good rep.

item.title: 317 HELP MEH ------- Adding working ancients?
item.dc:creator: @wilsonman60 wilsonman60
item.description:
@wilsonman60 wrote:

[quote=“Skillapwnz, post:2, topic:303974”]if you have already spawned the ancient altar to convert here’s the code::

[code]if (objectID == 6552) {
if (playerAncientMagics == 1){

		}
		if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			// /normal = 1151
			playerAncientMagics = 0;
			sM("You convert to normal magic!");
		} else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			playerAncientMagics = 1;
			sM("You convert to ancient magicks!");
		}
	}[/code]

if you haven’t spawned the altar im not sure how to spawn them really just request for that :P[/quote][quote=“RSPS Master, post:3, topic:303974”]Were not going to spoon feed you. Just wait till someone explains what you need to do.[quote author=Skillapwnz link=topic=400234.msg2968134#msg2968134 date=1253750848]
if you have already spawned the ancient altar to convert here’s the code::

[code]if (objectID == 6552) {
if (playerAncientMagics == 1){

		}
		if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			// /normal = 1151
			playerAncientMagics = 0;
			sM("You convert to normal magic!");
		} else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			playerAncientMagics = 1;
			sM("You convert to ancient magicks!");
		}
	}[/code]

if you haven’t spawned the altar im not sure how to spawn them really just request for that
[/quote]

Thanks for doing that. Now he will just think he can go around asking for things. We need to teach, not give.[/quote] I NEED TO FIGURE OUT HOW IT WORKS SUCH AS TELES AND CASTS[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2009, 04:24:06 pm[/size][hr][size=99pt]PLZ HELP ME GIVE YOU CRDZ WHEN I PUBLISH MY SERVER JUST 1 MORE THING TILL AUSTIN-SCAPE V 2.0 [/size]

Read full topic

item.title: 317 HELP MEH ------- Adding working ancients?
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Master1 RSPS Master
item.description:
@RSPS_Master1 wrote:

Were not going to spoon feed you. Just wait till someone explains what you need to do.[quote=“Skillapwnz, post:2, topic:303974”]if you have already spawned the ancient altar to convert here’s the code::

[code]if (objectID == 6552) {
if (playerAncientMagics == 1){

		}
		if (playerAncientMagics == 1) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			// /normal = 1151
			playerAncientMagics = 0;
			sM("You convert to normal magic!");
		} else if (playerAncientMagics == 0) {
			setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855);
			playerAncientMagics = 1;
			sM("You convert to ancient magicks!");
		}
	}[/code]

if you haven’t spawned the altar im not sure how to spawn them really just request for that :P[/quote]

Thanks for doing that. Now he will just think he can go around asking for things. We need to teach, not give.
